mapper.insert: INSERT INTO private_chat_unread (user_id, contact_id, unread_count, last_message_time, last_message_content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{contactId}, 1, #{lastMessageTime}, #{lastMessageContent}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE unread_count = unread_count + 1, last_message_time = #{lastMessageTime}, last_message_content = #{lastMessageContent}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, contact_id, unread_count, last_message_time, last_message_content FROM private_chat_unread WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND unread_count > 0 ORDER BY last_message_time DESC
